name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to construction
Acceptance Criteria - Ducts shall comply with AS/NZS 61386:2015 or AS/NZS 2053.2:2001
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Prior to construction

Acceptance Criteria - The bedding material shall contain no organic material that will affect embedment material performance.The bedding material shall be free of materials that would be physically or chemically harmful to any pipeline component, including any protective coating
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Minimum bedding
Acceptance Criteria - A fine layer of fine sand to be laid at the bottom of the trench and top of duct. Minimum bedding layer to be 100mm . Ensure the bottom of trench is free from sharp stones
Verifying Document - Photos, DN-QUA-QC-26 Ducting Installation Checksheet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Duct spacing
Acceptance Criteria - Duct to be installed  with with 50mm minimum gap between ducts and 50mm between duct and trench wall.
○ Check vs Trench detail. Chorus gapping to be maintained where required.
Verifying Document - Photos, DN-QUA-QC-26 Ducting Installation Checksheet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Duct location
Acceptance Criteria - Surveyor / Site Engineer to as-built duct location
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Underground service warning
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure warning tape is installed 300mm above top of duct
Verifying Document - Photos, DN-QUA-QC-26 Ducting Installation Checksheet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Minimum cover
Acceptance Criteria - 900mm minimum cover for ducts on road verge
Verifying Document - Photos, As Builts, DN-QUA-QC-26 Ducting Installation Checksheet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Compaction of granular fill
○  Beneath Pavement Layers: 95% MDD and+/- 2% of OMC as determined from the plateau test/or lab testing. None less than 92%
○  Inside Pavement Layers: 98% MDD and+/- 2% of OMC as determined from the plateau test/or lab testing. None less than 95%
Frequency - 1 set of NDM tests per lift (comprising 5 No. NDM  tests per set)
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Compaction of as won material
Acceptance Criteria - Ensure compaction in 200-250mm lifts of suitable as-won material.
Verifying Document - Photos, DN-QUA-QC-26 Ducting Installation Checksheet
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Upon completion of works
Acceptance Criteria - Comply with the project specification and drawings
Verifying Document - As built survey record completed
